entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:08 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: W 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
